about_the_game:
A terrible secret is forming somewhere deep in Cemanahuac. Some say they saw lifeless matter come to life in front of their own eyes. The embodiment of the Smoking Mirror catches a glimpse of this, thus becoming an Interloper in a scheme that only a few know about.
He now has to cross into strange new territories far from his home in Tenochtitlan, and fight to survive, hoping to stop the plan of the unknown malefactors and finish his duties as ixiptla.

Features:

  • Vast explorable world, with diverse and colorful areas, each with its own unique enemies to face and traps to avoid.
  • Optional local cooperative multiplayer, allowing you to go through the whole game together.
  • Beautiful hand-drawn visuals based on mesoamerican codices.
  • Handcrafted levels with randomized elements to create unique situations every time you go through an area.
  • Multitude of challenging bosses and minibosses, from human-sized to colossal ones.
  • A satisfying combat system focused on wearing your opponents down with back and forth parries and attacks.
  • Large selection of weapons, both close range and throwable, items and equippable abilities.
  • Enemies and wildlife that interact with not only the player, but each other as well.
  • A colorful cast of NPCs with their own motivations and storylines, whose journeys you can choose to aid or hinder.
  • Rich and complex story taking you through large-scale conspiracies, immense pain and a changing world.

name: Sixth Sun
short_description: Sixth Sun is a challenging and methodical 2D action game set in an alternate 1500s Mexico. Explore diverse and deadly areas, face terrible foes and gain new alliances to uncover and put an end to the malefactors’ plan.
